info.name: Green RX - Complete API Collection v2.0
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for Green RX medical prescription management system. Includes 185+ endpoints across 20+ modules for mobile app development.

**New in v3.2 - P0 Features: Disease Warning Rules & Medicine Suggestions - Updated Medical/Family History to use Disease references:**
- Import/Export APIs
- Drug Interaction Detection
- Notification System
- Admin Management
- Medical Reports
- Rating System
- Visit Tracking
- Prescription Versioning
- Adverse Drug Reaction Tracking
- Patient Share Links
- Audit Logs

**For Mobile Developers:**
See MOBILE_APP_API_DOCUMENTATION.md for complete documentation with examples.

request.description: Add medical history. Accepts **single object or array of objects** (same route). Use array for mobile forms with multiple entries. Response: { message, count, medicalHistories }.
Add family history. Accepts **single object or array of objects** (same route). Use array for mobile forms. Response: { message, count, familyHistories }.

body.raw:
{
  "smoking": false,
  "alcoholAbuse": false,
  "excessCaffeine": true,
  "waterDaily": 2.5,
  "travellerAbroad": false,
  "annualVaccination": true,
  "surgeriesLast3Months": false
}

request.description: Add child profiles. Accepts **single object or array of objects** (same route). Use array for mobile forms. Required: name, dateOfBirth (ISO), gender, ageClassification. Response: { message, count, childProfiles }.

body.raw:
{
  "patientId": 1,
  "tradeNameId": 25,
  "reactionType": "Nausea and Dizziness",
  "severity": "Moderate",
  "description": "Started feeling nauseous 2 hours after taking medication",
  "onsetDate": "2025-12-22T12:00:00Z"
}

{
  "patientId": 1,
  "reportType": "LabReport",
  "reportName": "Blood Test Results",
  "reportDate": "2025-12-20",
  "findings": "All values within normal range"
}

{
  "diseaseId": 1,
  "ruleType": "BLOCK_ACTIVE_SUBSTANCE",
  "targetActiveSubstanceId": 5,
  "severity": "Critical",
  "warningMessage": "This medicine is contraindicated for this disease",
  "autoBlock": true,
  "requiresOverride": false,
  "requiredMonitoring": "Weekly CBC"
}

{
  "tradeName": "Ozempic",
  "activeSubstance": "Semaglutide",
  "concentration": "1mg/ml",
  "dosageForm": "Injection",
  "manufacturer": "Novo Nordisk",
  "reason": "Many diabetic patients requesting this GLP-1 agonist for better glucose control"
}
